T0001.name: introline
T0001.text: Welcome to “Haunts TV” where we banish ghosts! Today we’re at an abandoned lodge, and I’ve got to get inside somehow. Press ‘W’ to walk.

T0002.name: doorline
T0002.text: Blue door lock, must be a blue key around.

T0006.name: lookaround
T0006.text: Use your mouse to look around

T0007.name: camera
T0007.text: It's a bit dark in here, better get my night vision camera out. Press the 'Q' button

T0008.name: cameraRunningLow
T0008.text: Shame I only have a limited tape size on my night vision camera

T0009.name: skull
T0009.text: A rare artifact - The chieftains skull

T0010.name: burialGround
T0010.text: Behind this door are the foundations of this building

T0011.name: story
T0011.text: Legend says that this lodge was built on a old burial ground. Only the skull of the chieftan can restore sanctity to this tomb

E0001.name: endGame
E0001.text: It's a dug up grave... Looks like it's missing something

T0012.name: mineIntro
T0012.text: Welcome back to "Haunts TV"! We've received a tip off about a haunted mine so we're going in to investigate. Rumour has it a miner haunts the caves here and he won't rest until the last gold ore has been mined!

T0013.name: mineCart
T0013.text: Tracks? I wonder if they lead anywhere...

T0014.name: oreIntro
T0014.text: Hey look, some gold ore, I just need to find a pickaxe to mine it

T0015.name: picaxe
T0015.text: This must be the ghost miners pickaxe!
